title: General Intelligence Learning Design Process Based on Mammalian Brain Structures

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of neuroscience and artificial intelligence concepts
context.additional_context: Strengthening cognitive modeling approaches for addressing social issues.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the learning mechanisms of the mammalian brain through three or more core principles
Learners can comparatively analyze the fourth-generation design structure of adaptive dynamic programming (ADP), including reinforcement learning
Learners can utilize social decision-making simulation tools based on biological intelligence models
Learners can complete smartphone-based cognitive optimization tasks with over 80% accuracy under limited technological conditions
Learners can logically describe case studies applying the mammalian brain model in comprehensive assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
